classData.name: Task

classData.description:
Adds a task to collection.
Typically used via `start(task)`
classData.name: createTask

classData.comment:
/**
     * Removes a task from collection.
     * @param {String} taskId
     */
classData.name: removeTask

classData.comment:
/**
     * Runs a task from collection.
     * @param {String} taskId
     */
classData.name: run

classData.description: Adds a task and runs it.
classData.name: start

classData.comment:
/**
     * Stops a task and resets configs.
     * If remove is true it will remove the task from the collection
     * @param {String} taskId
     * @param {Boolean} remove
     */
classData.description:
Stops a task and resets configs.
If remove is true it will remove the task from the collection
classData.name: stop

classData.comment:
/**
     * Stops all running tasks from collection.
     * If remove is true, it will remove all tasks from Manager
     * @param {Boolean} remove
     */
classData.description:
Stops all running tasks from collection.
If remove is true, it will remove all tasks from Manager
classData.name: stopAll
